room_title: Escape room "Close Quarters: The Purge" by Escape Game Knoxville in Knoxville
room_description: You have been selected and captured. You and 3 of your friends find yourselves blindfolded and locked up awaiting "The Purge". You have one hour to escape. The only problem? You and your friends are all in different rooms and must only use communication and your wits to survive.
